sequence: This machine is great if you want a creamy good espresso! We been having this machine already for 3 months and still working properly. The only negative think I can say about it is that it is pretty noisy, unless you hold the cover of the water container and also the aluminium tray. A part that I will definitely recommend it to a friend.

Now I'm giving this one five stars. It's the second one I've had and it's a great machine. Easy to operate and gives the expresso a great crema. It also has the tamp fitted on the side of the machine which is really useful and it's attractive to look at. I have bought their newer model for a holiday home and it's not a patch on this one.
Terrible machine. Make a lot of noise and start leaking after 13 months (warrenty ended on month 12). No help at all from Delonghi, just a poor product & poor customer service

Total crap. Have had it 3 months, leaks all the time, even when off. Wish I had taken a closer look at the reviews. Worked fine for a while. Almost returned it once bc of the milk frother but found a missing piece. Wish I had returned it when I had the chance.
Loud , and rattling water tank, although brews fantastic coffee!

I was recommended it.Why I choose 4 stars. the answer is in the following sentence.I thought the coffee fitter container was too small only for very small cups. so I would have preferred larger coffee fitter/container, and the hot water reservoir heated up a small amount of water. .A fiend recommended De'longhi to me.
Fast delivery. The machine is of great quality except loud noise when in operation. It can make excellent coffee! We absolutely love it.
Just what I wanted and it matches my Kitchen colour.  Easy to use I will definitely be increasing my coffee intake

ORMAI è 4 ANNI CHE UTILIZZAVO QUESTA MACCHINETTA. USO IL TEMPO PASSATO Perché PROPRIO OGGI HA SMESSO DI FUNZIONARE, DOPO QUALCHE AVVISAGLIA DI QUALCHE SETTIMANA. PREMETTO QUANTO SEGUE:-non posso certo dire che sia stata super sfruttata, abito da sola e la media era di un caffe al gg... a casa mia sfornano 10 caffe al gg eppure la macchinetta ce l'hanno quasi 10 anni.-è sempre stata molto rumorosa, avendo esperienza con altre macchinette azzarderei a dire perfino troppo.-ha perso acqua quasi da subito proprio a livello dell 'uscita acqua per il caffe, dove si posiziona il braccio col filtro, anche se la cosa avveniva in maniera discontinua.-ho dovuto sostituire il braccio e il filtro dopo circa 1 anno. eppure li ho sempre lavati e tenuti benepessima esperienza. bel prodotto d'estetica ma non la ricomprerei ne la consiglierei
